author: boudoul
body: This PR is removing the (very) old slhc option from configBuilder to prevent its usage - It was defined years ago in SLHC releases and never maintained since ~4 years and is calling deprecated configs (was aimed to be used at the time of 4_2X_SLHC release and not anymore even for the official SLHC upgrade productions of the last 2-3 years )
title: Removing  'slhc' option from ConfigBuilder
